Notes.Text:
This update for krb5 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-26458: Fixed a memory leak in pmap_rmt.c (bsc#1220770)
- CVE-2024-26461: Fixed a memory leak in k5sealv3.c (bsc#1220771)
Notes.Title: Details
